steps.instructions:
Navigate to start location and confirm you are on the Homepage.

Browse the page to locate and activate "Get started"

Confirm you are on the Pop Quiz 1/8 page.

Navigate to and select the pup's gender.

Enter the pup's name "Ally".

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Navigate to and select pup's birthday year and month.

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Navigate to the "What breed() is Ally?" and enter 'German She" and select a "German Shepperd. Dog" is any.

While within "What breed(s) Ally?" search and add "English Cocker Spaniel".

While within "What breed(s) Ally?" add any third breed and record if you are able to.

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Confirm you are on the Pup Quiz 4/8.

Navigate to and enter "15" into the Pup's current weight in lb field.

Locate and record a note from within "Pup's future adult weight in lbs (optional)" about how daily calories determined.

Navigate to and select "Neutered".

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Navigate to and activate "Active" from "How active is Ally?"

Navigate to and select "Fish" from within "Does he have any food allergies or sensitivities?"

Navigate to "Other" and select "Alligator"

Add "Basil" as another food allergy.

Remove "Basil" as another food allergy.

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Navigate to and activate "About Right" from within "What is Test's typical stool situation?"

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Confirm you are on the Pup Quiz 8/8.

Navigate to What is your first name? and enter "Level Access"

Navigate to "And your email?" and enter your Level Access email.

Navigate to and activate Continue.

Confirm you are on the "We're crunching some numbers to recommend the right amount of calories for Ally."

Navigate to and activate "View results".

On the page "How should we prepare Ally's food?" navigate to "Full Fresh Plan" and record the price.

Navigate to and activate "Select" for Full Fresh Plan.

Navigate to and activate Continue.

On the "Choose Ally's Fresh recipes" navigate to and activate "Add" for Pork, Chicken, and Beef options. 

Navigate to and activate Continue.

On the "Would Ally like treats or supplements?" page, activate "Add to your plan" "Beef and Sweet Potato Jerky" 

Browse and set frequency as "Every other box" and activate "Add".


Navigate to and activate Continue.

Confirm landing on the Secure Checkout page.
Browse the Shipping address form and verify accessibility of error messages if any.
Fill out the form with the following credentials.
First Name: Rafael 
Last Name: De La Rosa
Address: 3495 Lakeside Dr.
Apt: 1089
Zip code: 89509
City: Reno
State NV

Navigate to Account information form and verify accessibility of error messages if any.

Enter password and and confirm password values.

Navigate to Billing information form, brose the form and verify accessibility of error messages if any.

Fill out the Billing information form with the following Billing Information credentials:
[Step 16 -Billing Information credentials]
Name on card: Rafael De La Rosa
Card number: 4148460192654540
Expiration date: 03/25
CVC: 288
Navigate to the Order summary section.

Record the price for the starter box and Subscription Extras.

[Note: You Must use the promo code for 100% off in the checkout] 

Navigate to and activate "Change the code" and enter: levelaccessaudit100

Navigate to and activate "Apply"

Confirm that 100% off discount applied and record "Today's Total" value.

Browse to locate and record how often plan will be billed and shipped. 

Navigate to and activate "Checkout"

Confirm your order placed successfully.

name: Take Quiz, select plan, and checkout
goal: Successfully complete the quiz, select plan and checkout.
